message:
@everyone Breaking Language Barriers: Cryptohopper Now Available in 14 Languages (BETA)!

Struggling with language barriers while using Cryptohopper in English? Great news! Platform translations are now in BETA across 14 languages, including German, Dutch, Spanish, Czech, French, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese (Brazilian), Russian, Turkish and Chinese. Not a beta user yet? Simply go to your user profile, select settings, and enable 'BETA user'. Then scroll to the bottom of your Dashboard and select your language:
https://www.cryptohopper.com/edit-profile

Notice any incorrect translations or have feedback? Please contact support so we can improve the experience in your preferred language for all users!

Track crypto prices, technical indicators, and market sentiment all in one place. Perfect for day traders, swing traders, and HODLers alike. 
 
Check it out in 14 languages! 
 
https://www.cryptohopper.com/blog/introducing-cryptohopper-s-new-currencies-page-track-crypto-prices-11863

@everyone ğŸ† Compete & Win: Cryptohopper Monthly Trading Tournament ğŸ†

Join the crypto trading competition featuring ALL exchanges and ALL currencies! Put your trading strategies to the test against traders worldwide and win Cryptohopper trading bot subscriptions.

Why participate:

- Showcase your trading skills on any exchange of your choice
- Trade any cryptocurrency in your preferred market
- Win valuable Cryptohopper bot subscriptions to automate your future trades

How to join: 

- Click the "Join Tournament" button below:
https://www.cryptohopper.com/tournaments/tournament/1465  
- Select your trading bot
- Compete from day one to maximize your chances

Check the Prizes tab for complete details on tournament rewards.
